feature_model.name: FeatureIDE model
feature_model.feature_tree: :r MonitorEngine(MonitorEngine) :m MonitorEngineperformance(MonitorEngineperformance) :m Monitortemperatures(Monitortemperatures) :o coolant(coolant) :m oil(oil) :m engine(engine) :m transmission(transmission) :m MonitorRPM(MonitorRPM) :m Monitorexhaustlevelsandtemperature(Monitorexhaustlevelsandtemperature) :m MonitorFuelConsumption(MonitorFuelConsumption) :m Measures(Measures) :g [1,1] : a1perkm(a1perkm) : gallonpermile(gallonpermile) :m Methods(Methods) :g [1,1] : Basedondistance(Basedondistance) : Basedontypeofdriving(Basedontypeofdriving) : Basedondriving(Basedondriving) :o temperature(temperature) :g [1,*] : F1(F1) : F2(F2)
